page.title: 03MR.VAISEY
page.content: MR P VAISEY WAS 75 YEARS OLD. MISS BRUTON WASTHE HEAD OF THE INFANTS SCHOOL WHERE MR VAISEY ATTENDED.BUT HE THOUGHT IT WAS VERY THRILLING TO BE SEEN WITH MATES GOING TO THE BIG SCHOOL.WHE HE WAS NEARLY 11 YEARS HE EDDIE POWEL,JIM STADDON AND CYRIL COOPER PASSED THE EXAMINATION TO GO TO THE GRAMMER SCHOOL. FROM AN EARLY AGE MR VAISEY WAS INTERESTED IN CARPENTRY.HE HAS WORKED FOR A FAMILY FIRM C.J.RANGER AND F.T.RANGER.HE IS NOW CHAIRMAN OF THE COMPANY. THE RANGERS WERE UNDERTAKERS AND HAD NO FUNERAL CAR.THE COFFIN WAS PUSHED ALONG BY BIER.MR VAISEY HAS BEEN A SCHOOL GOVENOR FOR OVER 20 YEARS AND HAS ENJOYED IT.MR VAISEY SPENDS HIS TIME NOW POPPING TO HIS YATE OFFICE. A FOUNDER MEMBER OF THE SOCAIL CLUB HE ENJOYED A PINT.MR VAISEY DIED JAN 1985
